mdq:check.name: Resource Methods Present
mdq:check.description: Check that a detailed methods section is present.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status global detailedMethodsText
import metadig.variable as mvar
# A detailed methods section is not present if 'detailedMethodsText' not in globals() or detailedMethodsText is None: output = "No detailed methods section were found." status = "FAILURE" return False
detailedMethodsText = mvar.toUnicode(detailedMethodsText) if (mvar.isBlank(detailedMethodsText)): output = "The detailed methods section is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: output = "A detailed methods section was found." status = "SUCCESS" return True
